body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello, thank you for contacting Hotel Paradise customer support. My name is Paul Reed. May I have your name please?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hi, my name is Megan Cook.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Nice to meet you, Megan. How can I assist you today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I recently stayed at your hotel and was surprised by the food quality.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I'm sorry to hear that, Megan. In order to assist you better, could you provide your room number during your stay?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: My room number was two four eight.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Megan. And can you also confirm the dates of your stay for our records, please?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I stayed from the fourteenth to the seventeenth of this month.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for sharing that information, Megan. We will investigate the matter further. Is there anything else you'd like to add or any other concerns you have?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: No, that's all. Thank you for your help.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: You're welcome, Megan. Thank you for bringing this to our attention. We will follow up with you shortly. Have a great day!
